title: Down 4 So Long Pt. I with Vampire Weekend’s Ezra Koenig
description:
This week the gd mf boyz are joined by the first ever Throwing Fits guest: the fit god himself, Vampire Weekend’s Ezra Koenig. Ezra hits the stu to talk about the band’s earliest sartorial rules, bonding over jawnz with James Blake, and how the ‘90s hippie revival aesthetic influenced his work on the band’s latest album. 
 
For more Throwing Fits, check us out on Patreon: www.patreon.com/throwingfits.
dc:creator: Throwing Fits
